title: How do I View the Full Name of a Patient Education Resource?
body:
Follow these steps to View the Full Name of a Patient Education Resource:
Click the More tab and select Settings from the drop-down menu
Click Patient Education
Hover your mouse over the Name of the resource
The full name of the resource will appear on the right-hand side
Creating a New Letter Template
  If you need further assistance please contact support on 1300 103 903 or email at support@medirecords.com
